text: Nocardioides daedukensis is a gram-positive and non-motile bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from soil around a wastewater treatment plant in Taejon, South Korea.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides daedukensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase daedukensis Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Nocardioides daedukensis
